title: Futura like sans
content:
Hello everyone...

I submited this image to my.fonts search query, but nearest result wasn't font from image  
Image is croped from cover of Good House keeping magazine, in case anyone asks  
Anyone know the answer?

Tnx

Font: 

 Neutraface No. 2 

Solved By: 

 [bowfinpw](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701110856/http:/typophile.com/user/2088 "View user profile.")

author: super_mrki

comments.content:
I think it looks a lot like [House Neutraface No.2](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701110856/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface2) in the Display Bold weight.

- Mike Yanega

And I think you broke world record in solving this one... :)  
I thought of Neutraface in first place, then on Verlag from H&J, but offcourse, House Industries it is...

Tnx a lot
